org.spongepowered.api.block

Interface BlockState


  • public interface BlockState
    Represents a block using BlockType and a list of DataManipulator instances.

    States are considered immutable DataHolders as the contained DataManipulators can not be changed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BlockState cycleProperty(DataManipulator<?> property)
      Get an altered BlockState with the given property set to the next valid value for that property, cycling to the lowest value after the highest value.
      Optional<DataManipulator<?>> getManipulatorByName(String name)
      Get a property from its name.
      ImmutableCollection<String> getManipulatorIds()
      Gets all property names defined on this BlockState.
      ImmutableCollection<DataManipulator<?>> getManipulators()
      Get all properties defined on this BlockState, with their current values.
      Optional<? extends Comparable<?>> getManipulatorValue(String name)
      Get the current value of a given property.
      BlockType getType()
      Get the base type of block.
      BlockState withData(DataManipulator<?> property)
      Get an altered BlockState with the given property set to the given value.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        BlockType getType()
        Get the base type of block.

        The type does not include block data such as the contents of inventories.

        Returns:
        The type of block

      • getManipulators

        ImmutableCollection<DataManipulator<?>> getManipulators()
        Get all properties defined on this BlockState, with their current values.
        Returns:
        Map of all current properties

      • getManipulatorIds

        ImmutableCollection<String> getManipulatorIds()
        Gets all property names defined on this BlockState.
        Returns:
        Collection of property names

      • getManipulatorByName

        Optional<DataManipulator<?>> getManipulatorByName(String name)
        Get a property from its name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the property
        Returns:
        The property with the given name or Optional.absent() if not found

      • getManipulatorValue

        Optional<? extends Comparable<?>> getManipulatorValue(String name)
        Get the current value of a given property.
        Parameters:
        name - Property to get value of
        Returns:
        Current value of the property or Optional.absent() if not found

      • withData

        BlockState withData(DataManipulator<?> property)
        Get an altered BlockState with the given property set to the given value.

        This does not alter the current BlockState instance

        Parameters:
        property - Property to change value of
        Returns:
        A BlockState with the property's value modified

      • cycleProperty

        BlockState cycleProperty(DataManipulator<?> property)
        Get an altered BlockState with the given property set to the next valid value for that property, cycling to the lowest value after the highest value.

        This does not alter the current BlockState instance

        Parameters:
        property - Property to change value of
        Returns:
        A BlockState with the property's value modified
